titles.title: The Weapons of Our Warfare (2 Corinthians 10:4)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
The weapons of our warfare
Are not carnal,
But they are mighty,
But they are mighty.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The weapons of our warfare
Are not carnal,
But they are mighty
Through the Holy Ghost.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And they are strong
To the tearing down of strongholds,
And they are mighty,
And they are mighty.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
And they are strong
To the tearing down of strongholds,
And they are mighty
Through the Holy Ghost.
